thread.title: Melanie Taylor

author: Melanie Taylor
title: Melanie Taylor
text: We were looking for a hire car for our holiday in NZ. There were four adults travelling together so we needed a large car with plenty of boot space. It was easy to move around the website and compare hire car companies. There was plenty of choice, am so happy that we chose Apex Car Rentals, they were so easy to deal with and provided excellent service.
